channel.title: okr on ProgramMur - 程序猿碎念
channel.description: Recent content in okr on ProgramMur - 程序猿碎念

item.title: Elevator Pitch
item.author: androchentw@gmail.com (androchentw)
item.description: Overview 行之有年的 elevator pitch, 概念易懂, 卻需要有意識地練習精簡表達. Challenges Profile: Personal Development Jobs Express ideas briefly Begin with the end in mind Pains Tend to explain too much detail Gains Template or framework to follow for thought Objectives Able to pitch ideas in (30s, 3min, 10min) depending on different scenarios. KRs

item.title: Value Proposition
item.author: androchentw@gmail.com (androchentw)
item.description: Overview 最近嘗試 Product Management 的概念套用在包裝日常工作內容 Full Scope Overview: 更清楚地規劃有哪些事情要做 Focus and Prioritize: 判斷優先順序, 專注在重要的事物上 Sense of Accomplishment: 更有成就感, 而不是渾厄

item.title: OKR Weekdone
item.author: androchentw@gmail.com (androchentw)
item.description: Overview OKR 作為企業與個人的目標設定心法, 已經是當代顯學. 然而, 如何快速 思考/撰寫 良好/有效的 OKR 並持續追蹤, 確保自己在正軌上 是目前我將 OKR 運用在人生目
